channel.title: Gargantua Electric Socket Bug [Fixed]
channel.description:
[url='https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_ApzOZop22k']Gargantua Electric Socket Bug 21:13[/url]
Got a bug where I put the electric lead in the socket and got stuck to the wall during the gargantua fight, had to spin like a ballerina whilst sprinting jumping and crouching to break free lol

item.title: Gargantua Electric Socket Bug [Fixed]
item.dc:creator: sersoft
item.description:
there are lots of ways to get stuck in the Source engine, that’s why the electric sockets should be nocollide when they are plugged in

Read full topic

item.title: Gargantua Electric Socket Bug [Fixed]
item.dc:creator: MaxTheLimit
item.description:
Looks like you just got yourself into a tight spot that you just wiggled yourself out of. I’m gonna try to re-create that.

Read full topic
